parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command

</title><part><name>game1</name>=<value>  arma3

</value></part><part><name>version1</name>=<value> 1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - ListNBox

</value></part><part><name>descr</name>=<value>  Sets color of the right picture in a [[CT_LISTNBOX]].

</value></part><part><name>s1</name>=<value> [[lnbSetPictureColorRight]] [idc, [row, column], color]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> idc: [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> row: [[Number]] - Index of the row

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> column: [[Number]] - Index of the column

</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> color: [[Array]] - Color RGBA

</value></part><part><name>r1</name>=<value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> ctrl [[lnbSetPictureColorRight]] <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>[</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext>[row, column], color]

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> ctrl: [[Control]]

</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> row: [[Number]] - Index of the row

</value></part><part><name>p23</name>=<value> column: [[Number]] - Index of the column

</value></part><part><name>p24</name>=<value> color: [[Array]] - Color RGBA

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_control [[lnbSetPictureColorRight]] <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>[</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext>[0, 0], [1,1,1,0.5]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[lnbSetColor]] [[lnbColorRight]] [[lnbColor]]

</value></part></template></root>
